ISSUE.TITLE: Helm chart contains hard-coded credentials for health check
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: **Describe the bug** The readiness and liveness probes attempt to connect to the Spring Boot actuator. Since this is a protected resource a Basic authorization header is supplied. This encodes the default credentials (namely rest-admin/test for the REST app and admin/test for the others). **Expected behavior** Allow users to override these defaults through moving them to values.yaml. **Additional context** Flowable 6.5.0 connected to Postgres with charts packaged and deployed using Helm 3.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Reset jobs: add null check to avoid NPE
